snippet.title: Teslagrad Remastered - Launch Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Teslagrad Remastered is available now on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/teslagrad-remastered-switch/

Re-experience an indie classic in Teslagrad Remastered, a 2D puzzle platformer set in a steampunk inspired version of old Europe. Journey deep into the abandoned Tesla Tower, harness the ancient art of Teslamancy to command magnetism and other electromagnetic powers, and navigate the perils within to unravel a long-forgotten conspiracy. With updated visuals, new levels to explore, and updated system mechanics, this is the definitive way to experience Teslagrad again or for the first time!

#TeslagradRemastered #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
